alert.note: Alert for Ionia; Kent (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 1:31PM EDT until July 20 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kent County in southwestern Michigan... Ionia County in south central Michigan... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 131 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Carson City to near Grandville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grand Rapids... Ionia... Portland... Wyoming... Kentwood... Grandville... East Grand Rapids... Belding... Lowell... Lake Odessa... Caledonia... Saranac... Gerald R. Ford Inter... Ada... Orleans... Sebewa... Lyons... Muir... Mulliken... Pewamo... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
